title: Set up development environment
text: Install and configure all necessary development tools including IDE, version control, and package managers for the project.

title: Design database schema
text: Create a comprehensive database schema that includes all necessary tables, relationships, and indexes to support the application's data requirements.

title: Implement user authentication
text: Build a secure authentication system with login, registration, password reset functionality, and session management.

title: Create API endpoints
text: Develop RESTful API endpoints for all core features including CRUD operations, with proper error handling and validation.

title: Build responsive UI components
text: Design and implement reusable UI components that work seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

title: Write unit tests
text: Create comprehensive unit tests for all business logic and critical functions to ensure code reliability and maintainability.

title: Optimize application performance
text: Analyze and improve application performance by implementing caching, lazy loading, and optimizing database queries.

title: Deploy to production
text: Set up production environment, configure CI/CD pipeline, and deploy the application with proper monitoring and logging.
